rows.label: qst702303_msg0001
rows.name:
I found a Shiyan encryption device
on this man.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0002
rows.name: A spy, then. I see...

rows.label: qst702303_msg0003
rows.name:
An Superbian citizen, plotting together
with Shiya... Death is all he deserves.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0004
rows.name:
...Wait. You were tracking me down
and you didn't even know that?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0005
rows.name:
We weren't tracking you down
to begin with...

rows.label: qst702303_msg0006
rows.name:
Our Superbian troops have been
rounding up the Shiyan remnants
wherever they find them

rows.label: qst702303_msg0007
rows.name:
Perhaps this scum sensed he would be
found out soon, and decided to run...?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0008
rows.name:
...Why, thanks for the compliment!
However, I'd refrain from making it
sound like a done deal if I were you.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0009
rows.name:
Or don't, actually. Stay carefree.
All the easier for us to sweep your
legs from under you! Ahahaha!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm glad you're in high spirits, friend,
but have you considered taking your
current predicament more seriously?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Bah, I'm not about to be lectured by
some pretty little Iiran princeling!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0012
rows.name:
Adel.
Would you please let us take charge?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0013
rows.name:
Sure, go right ahead, but...
what are you planning to do?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0014
rows.name: Kagutsu/Wadatsumi

rows.label: qst702303_msg0015
rows.name:
We cannot suffer a caught spy to live.
Please handle it in the proscribed way.
And do be thorough.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0016
rows.name:
Wait, you don't mean...?
You can't be serious?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0017
rows.name:
..I'm sorry, Laura.
You don't have to look.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0018
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Aaaarghhh!!!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0019
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]How... How humiliatinggggg!!!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0020
rows.name:
He wouldn't keep still,
so it took some doing.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0021
rows.name:
And yet, the result speaks for itself.
Good job Kagutsuchi. Have you been
practicing?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0022
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Are you taking the mick?!
What the hell is this?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0023
rows.name:
I told you, did I not?
A caught spy cannot be allowed to live.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0024
rows.name:
Henceforth, you will not be allowed to
use Meknes's name. Starting today,
he will be no more.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0025
rows.name:
So, what, I just become someone else?
You must be soft in the head!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0026
rows.name:
You needn't worry.
You look much better this way.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0027
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]What the hell are you on about?!
Stop mocking me! You know that's
not what I meant!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0028
rows.name: Be silent.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0029
rows.name:
You insult not only my land, but also
my friend's. You think I'd overlook it?
Be glad you still draw breath.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0030
rows.name:
In case you haven't noticed, Hugo gets
a bit scary when he's angry.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0031
rows.name:
I know not if your overseers are
actually Shiyan, or simply looking to
misdirect our ire...

rows.label: qst702303_msg0032
rows.name:
What I do know, however, is that
no overseer would let a captured spy
remain in enemy hands.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0034
rows.name:
From now on, you'll be a follower of
Adel. That should serve as sufficient
cover, don't you think?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0035
rows.name: You're... You're helping me...?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0036
rows.name:
We all have our roles to play on life's
rich stage. We simply want you to be
able to keep playing yours.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0037
rows.name: Can you take it from here, Adel?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0038
rows.name:
Will do, friend.
I'll make a space for him in the capital.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0039
rows.name:
I'm sorry, did we just...press-gang the
poor bastard?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0040
rows.name:
If that had been our aim from the start,
we have many more prisoners waiting.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0041
rows.name:
But what I am after is the information
he has. One day we may need it...
That's why I'm giving him to Adel.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0042
rows.name:
Well then, in the meantime, we should 
go and report back on all this...
But what do we even say...?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0043
rows.name:
We can say that, sadly, blood-crazed
wild beasts got to him before we did.
He gave his life for Superbian honor.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0044
rows.name: ...That's...a truly unsettling smile, Hugo.
